data: COVID-19 Treatments
Status
Restricted to Critical Care providers OR COVID-19 Unit internists OR Infectious Diseases providers, per site restrictions
Refer to latest BC CDC - COVID-19 Therapeutics Committee Guidelines for most up-to-date criteria
Patient Care
Insert Peripheral IV (Intravenous) Catheter
T;N
Medications
Mildly - Moderately ill patients
Refer to CDC Recomendations before placing medication order
nirmatrelvir-ritonavir (PAXLOVID)
For eGFR 60 mL/min or greater
nirmatrelvir (part of PAXLOVID kit) 150 mg tab
2 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 5 day, drug form: tab
ritonavir (part of PAXLOVID kit) 100 mg tab
1 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 5 day, drug form: tab
For eGFR 30 to 59 mL/min
nirmatrelvir (part of PAXLOVID kit) 150 mg tab
1 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 5 day, drug form: tab
ritonavir (part of PAXLOVID kit) 100 mg tab
1 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 5 day, drug form: tab
remdesivir
For eGFR 30 mL/min or greater
remdesivir
200 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
remdesivir
100 mg, IV, q24h, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: inj
For eGFR less than 30 mL/min (including dialysis)
remdesivir
200 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
remdesivir
100 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
Severely Ill Patients
Refer to CDC Recomendations before placing medication order
dexamethasone is strongly recommended for patients requiring mechanical ventilation and recommended for hospitalized patients requiring supplemental oxygen
dexamethasone
6 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 10 day, drug form: tab
6 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
dexamethasone
6 mg, IV, q24h, order duration: 10 day, drug form: inj
baricitinib
For eGFR 60 mL/min or greater
baricitinib
4 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
4 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 14 day
For eGFR 30 to 59 mL/min
baricitinib
2 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
2 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 14 day
For eGFR 15 to 29 mL/min
baricitinib
2 mg, PO, q2day, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
2 mg, NG-tube, q2day, order duration: 14 day
Critically Ill Patients
Refer to CDC Recomendations before placing medication order
dexamethasone is strongly recommended for patients requiring mechanical ventilation and recommended for hospitalized patients requiring supplemental oxygen
dexamethasone
6 mg, IV, q24h, order duration: 10 day, drug form: inj
dexamethasone
6 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 10 day, drug form: tab
6 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
baricitinib
For eGFR 60 mL/min or greater
baricitinib
4 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
4 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 14 day
For eGFR 30 to 59 mL/min
baricitinib
2 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
2 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 14 day
For eGFR 15 to 29 mL/min
baricitinib
2 mg, PO, q2day, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab
2 mg, NG-tube, q2day, order duration: 14 day
tocilizumab
acetaminophen
650 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: tab
diphenhydrAMINE
50 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: cap
diphenhydrAMINE
50 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
tocilizumab
400 mg, IV, once, administer over: 60 minute, drug form: inj
For infusions, select or modify the medications within Hypersensitivity/ Anaphylaxis Treatment Module as required
Hypersensitivity / Anaphylaxis Treatment (Module)
